instructions.title: How To Delete Your Amazon Account
instructions.before: There’s no one click option for closing your Amazon Account.  You’ll need to contact customer support.  It is also recommended that you do this from a computer. You cannot delete your Amazon account from within a mobile App.
instructions.after: Remember, the Amazon representative let you know the time frame in which your account will be closed.
thingsToRemember:
Your Amazon account is shared across Amazon’s websites, so if you delete it, you’ll lose access to Amazon.com as well as international stores.  Subscriptions like Amazon Prime will immediately end.
Amazon will also delete your accounts purchase history and customer data.  Meaning any reviews, discussion posts, and photos you’ve uploaded to Amazon’s website will also be erased.
Digital content you purchased will be gone, and you won’t be able to re- download.
To reopen a closed account contact customer support and send a new request to reopen your account.
Any open orders will be canceled. You won’t be able to return purchased items for a refund or replacement

qnAnswers.question: What are some of the things that will be deleted if I delete/close my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your Amazon account is shared across Amazon’s websites, so if you delete it, you’ll lose access to Amazon.com as well as international stores.  Subscriptions like Amazon Prime will immediately end. Amazon will also delete your accounts purchase history and customer data.  Meaning any reviews, discussion posts, and photos you’ve uploaded to Amazon’s website will also be erased.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to the kindle content I bought?
qnAnswers.answer: Digital content you purchased will be gone, and you won’t be able to re-download.

qnAnswers.question: Can I re-open a closed account?
qnAnswers.answer: To reopen a closed account contact customer support and send a new request to reopen your account.

qnAnswers.question: Can I ask for a refund after deleting my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Any open orders will be canceled. You won’t be able to return purchased items for a refund or replacement
